answers.answer: I got tested last week. I hated because the nurse had to poke me several times to find a good vein. But my test was negative but I thought for sure I would be positive because I sometimes will eat a piece of candy in the morning.  I would say just try and relax until you actually get the results good luck
I failed the one hour test and had to take the three hour test and passed

I have gestational diabetes, it's not too bad. I have to prick myself 4 times a day (that *****) but I do have to see a specialist every week but I get ultrasounds so I have so many pictures of my baby! It's not as bad as you think but I hope you don't have it!
I was nervous with my first one. But everything turned out ok
Braylenmommy13 I can only hope I dont have it also. Its gonna be a long 2 weeks for results thanks for the helpful response!
I took it over a week ago and I'm a sweet freak. I know its not good, but any time I can have a sweet I run for it lol I haven't gotten a call back yet so yeah... no news is good news (:
Yayykrystina1 aww thats no fun:/ I hope it goes away right after baby is born I've heard that's what usually happens. Best of luck to you and thank you for your response!
Im doing mine right now , and im trying my hardest not to throw up or I have to start all over . I got 45 minutes left . Great
Thanks for the response ladies best of luck HaegansMommy taylorshay13 NLC38!! :)
I took mines today nd i ddnt have any problems drinking nor did i feel sick...i just hope i pass

question: Who else got nervous for their glucose test?? I dont know but during my second trimester ive been really craving the sweets and now I just hate myself for giving in. Are there any moms who tested negative out there but thought they had it? or any that came out positive and what you guys are doing to treat it? Anything would help thanks ladies!
title: Help. Got my glucose test today and nervous!
